reviews.review: 这是第一款让我3D眩晕的游戏........_(:зゝ∠)_

Portal 2 сочетает в себе все качества игр, которую смело можно назвать шедевром: увлекательный сюжет, тонкий юмор.  Захватывающий геймплей и неповторимая атмосфера, для любителей головоломок. Очень крутой сингл и сетевой режим.

Just like the original, another amazing game with a deeper story.  The campaign is longer this time, but you find out more of what is going on, or at least what happened, that got you there.

New puzzles and new mechanics make this a must have.
这是一款让人着迷的解谜游戏，比起需要纯技术的关卡类游戏这游戏更偏向于思考的过程。在合作模式中也不是两个人手残互相甩锅，而是两个人一块思考如何通关再加上良好的 配合。我非常喜欢这款游戏，虽然没有全成就解锁但该打爆的都打爆了。不论是单人模式通关还是合作模式的结束都有很良心的片尾曲。在电梯上升后打开大门迎来阳光是一件多么动人的事情。虽然通关它只用了3天。。但是我觉得这款游戏是对得起他的价格的。
Gabe literally just called this piece Valve's best singleplayer game. If it's not enough for you, I don't know what is.
If it wasn't for wheatley i wouldnt have bought this game lol

Awesome game I played through the entire thing in a matter of days.
If you want to see my co op playthrough of the game here it is https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UwXfulYlKtc&t=195s
This game is amazing. Hype for Portal 3 starts now.

Beat this game on Sep 30, 2016, and holy moly is it a good one. It has so many unique things, that makes this game simply amazing. Took me around 15-20 hours, and it was worth it. Two complaint's are that I feel like they dragged out the story a lot, and didn't expand on things like [spoiler]GLaDOS' past[/spoiler], which could have been so awesome. I played this on my Steam Controller, and I honestly have to give this game like a 9/10. Excellent plot, excellent graphics, excellent sound, excellent game.

There are already plenty of brilliant reviews for this game. I just want to add a very simple "thumbs up" and recommendation here as well. One of most loved games in the genre (platform, puzzle). One of the best sequels ever. Brilliant, humorous, and extremely memorable writing, characters and story. Innovative mechanics and gameplay. Beautiful graphics and design. This is why we love VALVE. My rating for PORTAL 2: 9 out of 10.
10/10 si te gustó portal 1 no lo dudes. JUEGAZO

Na Razie moje największe growe doznanie tego roku.(oczywiście chodzi o gre jaką miałem okazje zagrac w tym roku gdyż ta gra ma 6 lat) Świetna fabuła, rozgrywka oraz humor który przeszedł już do historii

Una puta obra se arte tanto en historia como en la parte grafica, es un revoltijo de emociones, te hace reir, enojarte, entristecere con cada capitulo ademas de su trama explicita como implicita. Se lo recomendaria a cualquiera porque el 
sentimiento es unico

Their little gestures really makes it an experience on its own with the loved ones.

Для тех, кто любит подумать - самое оно )

Pros:
-Good gameplay & good gameplay mechanics / elements
-Good story
-Multiplayer
-lots of easter eggs!
-PTI (Perpetual Testing Initiative) (build your own test chambers)
-Portal Two Authoring Tools (Mainly Hammer)

Cons:
-Sadly both singleplayer and multiplayer story's are not that long (about 3 to 4 hours) (however both are much longer than the original portal)
-some gameplay mechanics / elements from portal were removed

Overall it is a great game and you should get it!
Люблю такие игры)

Better than Portal 1 of course. A better story, more interesting and funny characters. Great voice acting and not just linear puzzle rooms, but environments to tackle. As well as the addition of some new puzzle elements of course. Great game overall and the graphics are still holding up. Fullscreen and alt tab don't get along though under Windows 10. Thankfully the borderless windowed mode is actually in there and it looks absolutely the same as fullscreen.
had alot of fun ,really cool concept

One of the most greatest game I have played. It has a great storyline, great comedy, and moments that will make you go, didn't see that comin', and trust me you'll say those specific words quite a lot. IF you're a person who loves problem solvin' and puzzles, this game is definitely for you, if you're a story driven gamer, this game is for you, if you're a movie type of gamer, this game is for you, if you're a gamer, this game is definitely for you.
Si te gustan los juegos de pensar (de estrategia), y te gusta la idea de poder jugar modo cooperativo con un amigo, te lo recomiendo.

I played this game a long, long while ago but never posted a review. Well, what can I say, it's amazing! The banter is just my type of humor and overall the game is easy to pick up, and has a great scaling of skill. Would recommend!

really fun puzzle game

总体好评。
Portal 2 是总体来说是一款益智游戏，考验人的空间感知能力和对整体空间中所出现物品的把握能力。而双人模式也能够很好的考验双方的配合能力和反应能力。虽然故事情节极其简单，而且在大多数的时间内都是被主创牵着走，抛开密闭空间的测试之后，在生存路上出现的关卡少的可怜，大多数还是在应用之前教会的技巧。并且大多数玩家通关单人模式不会超过10个小时。除非你是想刷成就之类的。但不管这么说，这还是一款非常值得入手的游戏。
为啥突然我晕3d了……
Literalmente o melhor jogo que já joguei na vida.
퍼즐게임의 최고봉
Portal 2 is a real thinker! I don't think ive ever played a better puzzle game in my life

Very good game. I love it. It's nice to play alone or with a friend. I highly recommend it. I'll probably play again when I'll finish the game. I loved it so much I bought Portal. I've been playing for hours and I'm not even done yet. Yes, the puzzles look alike, but at the same time, they are different. Some are easier than others, but most of the time you have to think about what you're doing and even if it seems impossible at first, there's always a solution. The story is funny too. I can garantee you, either you're playing alone or with someone else, you'll enjoy it. You won't regret it.

10/10 every bit as good if not better than the first one

оценка: 10 тестовых комнат из 10.

Вниманию испытуемых:  в следущей тестовой камере находиться краткое описание этой интересной и добротной дичи.

вы с колобком идет к гладе, включаете ее, колобок вас кидает как лоха и скидывает вас с гладей в трубу, вы летите 5км потом 10 часов поднимаетесь вверх, выключаете колобка на луну и включаете гладю, тортика не будет, на выходе из лифта куб вам вернут.
I have completed the whole game and i think that if you want the best puzzle game in the world... then stop looking. you found it (it being portal 2). its a good sequal to portal and i recommend it

Just.....amazing.
The story of the game is amazing, the gameplay is fun, the multiplayer also has a interesting story...
Overall is the best game i played

Very funny, very challenging, very good game! Can't wait for the thrid one! *waits a few centuries*

Власть коррумпирует. Абсолютная власть коррумпирует абсолютно. Но нет времени раскаиваться, паря в космосе. Что сделано, то сделано.

С юмором игра, с отличным и логическим сюжетом (одновременно парадоксальным), с отличным дизайном звука, и с уникальным способом взаимодействовать со средой.

Игра переполнена характером, несерьёзностью и драмой.

Игра продолжает иновацию со времён выхода первой части игры серий Portal. По мимо новинки самой технологии порталов, в игру добавили так называемые жидкие гели, с помощью которых преодолеваешь препятствия. Мало того, туры уже не стерильно белые, теперь в них больше детализации (помню, слушая комментарии, такая детализация отвлекала тестёров от самой игры), мусора и растительности.

В игру добавили ещё двух новых персонажей, на ряду главной злодейки, и героини первой части.

Игра тугодумка. С  довольно не сложными головоломками. Но если жаждешь сложности, отправляйся на полотно тестовых камер сообщества, откуда можно черпать камеры на любой вкус. Хочешь поиграть с кем-то? Не проблема. В игре присутствует режим совместной игры: я играл с приятелем, общаясь по микрофону. Было весело и сложно.

Вобщем, игра отличная, юмористическая, и интересная. Рекомендую её всем, кто любит "кросворды".
盗版通关的，买个正版放着看。
Ma to strasne dlhy tutorial a tutuo hru mam uz 1 mesic a stale som ho nedokoncil ale ked nemate kamposa s ktorym to hravat tak sa fvam to neoplati .

✏️ INTRODUCTION ✏️ 

This game its an all-time classic when talking about a Cooperative Multiplayer, Portal 2 its a game with hundreds of levels that will make you and you partner (if you're playing coop) squeeze your brains thinking on how to solve the puzzles and quests creating 2 different types of portals, the blue one and the orange one.

✔️ASPECTS I LIKE ABOUT THE GAME✔️


⇨ There are so many levels, so you will not have to buy a spere dlc or anything like that in order to have tons of hours of fun with up to one more player.

⇨ The fact that its a cooperative game makes it just way better, you multiplay the fun x10 when you are playing with a frined while in a Skype call or something like that because you laugh of your own and your partner's fails, which will grant you so much fun

⇨ The game is only about 20 bucks and for that price you wont spect much for a game maybe, but this its definitely not that case, you will have so much fun and this might be one of my favourite games for that 20 to 30 dollar price range.

✖️ASPECTS I DONT LIKE ABOUT THE GAME✖️

⇨ Even though ther are a lot of different levels, some of them may in fact feel a little repetitive and may seem pretty similar to another one you just played before.

⇨ If you don't have a friend with this game as well to play with him, i won't recomend you tu buy it, in fact you can get a deal for 2 copies of Portal 2 on Steam for a little cheaper than buying them separately, which will be my best recomendation.

⇨ This game hasn't really recived a solid update since basically its release date, which by the way is all the way back to 2011, so i'd lioke to recive an interesting update that includes maybe more levels or even some new gamemodes.

Really good game.

The story  is great, the caracters likeable and the interaction are funny. The start is pretty slow though. Some of the unlocks are also hilarious.

The puzzles are sometimes difficult, but in a good and fair way. The way it uses gels is pretty interesting and causes great gameplay. 

It looks great and has a really good atmosphere, especially the parts in the old buildings. It also runs well.

Besides the single player, there is also a mode where you can make your own games and upload them. Had some problems with servers sometimes, but the mode is very interesting.

Enjoyed playing this game. It's a must have

One of the best games I have played in a long time. There are so many positives that I don't know where to start. The single player campaign is interesting, much like the first portal, but it ads on to it. I never found myself bored. The challenges were well balanced, and the most difficult ones made me think quite a bit before I completed it. Rarely was I frustrated to the point of giving up, but there were a few levels I wish didnt take me as long to figure out. Overall I had a lot of fun with the single player. 
The co-op ties into the story of the single player campaign. You have to work with your friend on all the levels to complete them. Much like the single campaign, the difficulty and the diversity of challenges is well balanced. There were a few times here as well where my friend and I were scratching out heads to solve the challenge, but overall it wasnt too frustrating. At times we had to think outside the box and that added to the fun. Highly recommend it.
The story of both the single and co-op game was very interesting all the way through. I highly recommend this game.

i played and beat both portal and portal two back in 2011 on my xbox. absolutely loved every minute of it. now in 2017 i decided to buy and play both games again on pc. im not sure exactly what it IS about these games that sucks me in so deeply. i almost cried when i beat portal two just now....... two of the best games ive ever played. if you have not played these games.... do yourself a tremendous favor and PLAY THEM. 10/10

Eines der besten Spiele die ich bisher gespielt habe. Der schwarze Humor, der Sarkasmus von GLaDOS und Cave Jonsen sind wahnsinnig lustig. Die Tests steigern sich wunderbar von simpel zu (gefühlt) fast unlösbar und der Multiplayer macht einfach nur Spaß.

Ich vermisse aber die Energiebälle aus dem ersten Spiel und aus irgendwelchen gefällt mir die optische Gestaltung der Testkammern bei Portal besser, aber wie gesagt einfach von der Optik her. 

Mehr Kritikpunkte habe ich nicht, tolles Speil mit tollen Charakteren.
C'est bien.

Very-Well Done game where you have to solve multiple puzzles just by using Physics!!! Great job Valve for making a game that can teach you about momentum, timing, and other things that involves physics. I also like the Co-op aspect of it also, but I wish it was Mel and Chell instead of P-Body and Atlas but what are ya gonna do.

У Portal 2 есть огромный, страшный, безобразный изъян. Её мало. 14 часов одиночной кампании и «коопа» пролетают мгновенно, словно летний сон. Рука так и тянется к «New Game», чтобы пройти игру снова, наслаждаясь умными головоломками и острыми, как лезвие бритвы, репликами героев. Но в одну реку не войти дважды — чертова память цепко держит каждую задачку. Остается слушать божественную арию из финального ролика и уповать на скорую амнезию. Или выход DLC — смотря что произойдет быстрее.
GOOD GAME

Kesin alınması gereken oyunlardan biri. Bir puzzle oyunu ancak bu kadar güzel hale getirilir. Bir bulmacayı çözdüğünüz zaman  ''Ben başardım'' hissini yaşamak. Hikayenin güzelliği. Oyuncuyu sıkmadan saatlerce oynatabilmesi gibi bir çok özelliği var oyunun. Kesin oynanması gereken bir oyun. Oyunu bitirdiğiniz zaman doyduğunuzu farkediyorsunuz.

花一天时间单人通关，到创意工坊里下了一堆图水了水，找小伙伴一起结果半小时不到他表示很晕……

然后是……

这游戏实在是太棒了！！！

优点：双传送门的解密设计，精巧又不太难的主线关卡，有趣的剧情以及G姐高冷的旁白，可自定义关卡的编辑器和丰富的创意工坊物品，有趣又不算太难的成就，惊险时刻响起的恰到好处的背景音乐，为双人模式而设计的专属剧情。

缺点：在传送门之间来回转视角可能会导致一部分朋友晕3D，其他暂未发现。

喜欢解密游戏的话一定要来试试看，不喜欢解密也可以来试试，或许会让你喜欢上的。
